Summary: We (my wife and I) saw three white discs moving slowly in line across the Sudbury River.
divs: sighting detailsthe following event occurred over twenty years ago but is still fresh in my mind: my wife and i were driving home from worcester after visiting with some friends. while driving in an easterly direction on sherman bridge road on the wayland\sudbury border, and looking south, we saw three discs moving slowly to the west. (we had just approached the wooden bridge and had a clear view of the river). the discs were in line, spaced equally apart, and moving silently over the river. at first, i thought they might be helicopters but they made no sound. they were approximately one hundred yards away. as they began to move out of view i drove quickly up the road and took a right on to ballfield rd (in wayland) thinking that i\we could get a better look as they moved away. unfortunately we could not as the view of the river was blocked by trees. so, that ended our experience. we remain convinced that we saw three ufos that evening.
trends: there have been no other sightings in wayland\sudbury
